amendment.description: To provide for certain information to be provided to victims of identity theft, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2059 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2059 proposed by Senator Cantwell. (consideration: CR S13876-13877; text: CR S13876) To provide for certain information to be provided to victims of identity theft, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2059 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2059 proposed by Senator Cantwell.
